description:
Legendary weapons for your SAMURAI WARRIORS officers will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Weapons for:
Hanzō Hattori, Yoshimoto Imagawa, Tadakatsu Honda, Ina, Ieyasu Tokugawa, Musashi Miyamoto, Kojirō Sasaki, Takatora Tōdō, Naotora Ii, Munenori Yagyū, and Naomasa Ii

■How to use
You can change Weapons from camp by selecting "Weapons" - "Equip Weapons".
name: Legendary Weapons Samurai Warriors Pack 2
